ProjectTitle: Precision livestock farming meets metabolomics: an integrative approach to understand and quantify resilience in dairy cows, and to identify resilience biomarkers based on blood plasma and milk metabolites.

2. Data: There are still some question marks in your table and xxx in responsibilities, is this to be decided later or did accidentally upload an draft version of your DMP? You can submit an updated version as intermediate if needed. 
3. Ethics: Please explain the ethics issues and include the approval number. 
7. Sharing: Have you considered using a repository for data sharing? If there are no suitable domain specific repositories in your field you can use KU Leuven RDR (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) RDR gives you data a DOI and metadata which makes it more findable and citable but you can still restrict access so others can request it via the repository.
